response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $1,000,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits the product offers while still allowing me to secure a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1000000}
